title: Scheffler's unique dominance over golf continues at Open Championship
content: Scheffler's march on Royal Portrush was a masterclass and proof that his approach is unlike anyone else's.

title: NFLPA's Tretter to resign amid union overhaul
content: NFLPA chief strategy officer JC Tretter is resigning from his position and has withdrawn himself from consideration for the interim executive director position.

title: Trump aims at stadium over Commanders' name
content: President Donald Trump is threatening to hold up a new stadium deal for Washington's NFL team if it does not restore its old name and is calling for Cleveland's baseball team to revert to its former name as well.

title: No drama: Scheffler adds The Open, 3rd Slam leg
content: Scottie Scheffler captured the third leg of the career Grand Slam, cruising to a four-stroke victory in the Open Championship for his fourth win in a major.

title: Knueppel-led Hornets win 1st summer league title
content: Kon Knueppel, the fourth pick in this year's NBA draft, scored 21 points, and Charlotte held off a Sacramento rally to beat the Kings 83-78 on Sunday for the Hornets' first summer league title.

title: 'Progressing' Clark likely out for Fever vs. Liberty
content: Caitlin Clark, who has missed 10 games because of soft tissue injuries, is unlikely to play on Tuesday at the New York Liberty and will undergo additional testing after suffering a right groin injury, Indiana Fever coach Stephanie White said.

title: Cowboys' Smith: Super Bowl still the expectation
content: Pro Bowl guard Tyler Smith said the expectations for the Dallas Cowboys this season remain what they've always been: "Super Bowl champions."

title: No. 1 running back Cooper commits to Longhorns
content: Texas continued its recruiting tear Sunday by securing the commitment of Derrek Cooper, the top-ranked running back in the 2026 class and the seventh-ranked prospect overall.

title: Reports: MLB looking into Braves coach's actions
content: According to multiple reports, MLB is investigating Saturday's occurrence from the Yankees' 12-9 victory, when Atlanta Braves coach Eddie Perez pointed to his head while conversing with New York's Jazz Chisholm Jr., while the All-Star was on second base.

title: 💎 Eagles' Super Bowl ring has pop-out wings
content: The Eagles' Super Bowl LIX rings feature a hidden button that, when pressed, extends the wings on either side, revealing coach Nick Sirianni's saying, "You can't be great without the greatness of others."

title: Inside the Vikings' creative plan that saved J.J. McCarthy's lost rookie season
content: A knee injury kept the No. 10 pick off the field, but McCarthy spent the season preparing in unique ways to be the 2025 starter.

title: What's next for Max Holloway and Paulo Costa after UFC 318?
content: ESPN MMA reporter Brett Okamoto plays matchmaker and predicts the next move for Max Holloway and other stars from UFC 318.

title: UFC 318: Poirier retires, Holloway impresses and the prelims are ... must-see?
content: Max Holloway and Dustin Poirier set the bar high for finale fights, even after the undercard showed out.

title: Pacquiao wants to fight again: Can Romero or Mayweather be next?
content: Manny Pacquiao wants to fight again, and he has a few ideas for his next bout before the end of the year.

title: Euro 2025 quarterfinal talking points: Berger's wonder save, semifinal predictions
content: The 2025 UEFA Women's European Championship is on to the semifinals. But what stood out for our reporters?

title: How every five-star college football recruit fits at his new school
content: There are 23 five-stars in the class of 2026. We look at how they got to their teams and what they'll do in college.

title: From Kevin Durant's Team Durant to Carmelo Anthony's Team Melo, these next-gen AAU stars got next
content: NBA stars such as Kevin Durant and Carmelo Anthony sponsor their own high school AAU shoe-circuit teams.

title: A glimpse of what was to come: Stars who have showed out at Peach Jam
content: Before these stars went to college basketball and the NBA, they showed their stuff at the Nike Peach Jam.

title: Five overreactions before 2025 NFL season: Commanders win NFC East? Chiefs lose AFC West?
content: Is the Bucs QB destined for a massive new contract? Will the Commanders own the NFC East? We're judging offseason overreactions.

title: AFC North: Ravens to three-peat? Rodgers to snap Tomlin's playoff skid?
content: The division is loaded with intrigue and talent, from Lamar Jackson to Joe Burrow and, now, Aaron Rodgers.

title: Timeline: Caitlin Clark's injury-riddled first half of the WNBA season
content: Three separate injuries have sidelined the Indiana point guard and All-Star for 10 regular-season WNBA games.

title: Rashford arrives in Barcelona ahead of loan move
content: Marcus Rashford landed in Barcelona on Sunday ahead of completing a season-long loan move from Manchester United.

title: Núñez scores 14-minute hat trick in Liverpool win
content: Darwin Núñez scored three goals in 14 first-half minutes for Liverpool as they beat Stoke City 5-0 in a behind-closed-doors friendly on Sunday.

title: Sources: Utd close on Mbeumo before U.S. tour
content: Man United are hopeful of completing the signing of Bryan Mbeumo in time to be part of their preseason tour of the U.S., sources have told ESPN.

title: England's Carter racially abused at Euro 2025
content: England defender Jess Carter said she has been subject to racial abuse during Euro 2025 and will step back from social media as a result.

title: This year will be different for Arsenal - Gabriel
content: Gabriel Magalhães revealed he signed a new contract with Arsenal because he believes "this season will be different" in the club's pursuit of trophies.

title: Messi scores 2, sets up 2 as Miami routs Red Bulls
content: Lionel Messi had two goals and two assists to lead Inter Miami CF to a bounce-back 5-1 win over the host New York Red Bulls on Saturday night in Harrison, New Jersey.

title: Source: USMNT's Sargent close to Wolfsburg move
content: USMNT forward Josh Sargent is on the verge of joining Bundesliga side Wolfsburg for a deal worth in excess of €21 million, a source has told ESPN.

title: USWNT's Rodman returns to training with Spirit
content: United States forward Trinity Rodman returned to training with the Washington Spirit on Saturday for the first time in three months.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United in for Chelsea's Jackson or Leipzig's Sesko
content: Manchester United are interested in taking striker Nicolas Jackson off Chelsea's hands. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: From Skylar Diggins to Eric Gordon: Ranking Indiana's top high school hoopers since 2000
content: As part of SportsCenter's "50 States in 50 Days" tour, we're spotlighting the top boys and girls hoopers to come out of Indiana based on high school career achievements.

title: Runway scare: 3 tyres burst after AI flight veers off course at Mumbai airport; all passengers safe
content: On Monday morning, an Air India A320, flight AI-2744 from Kochi, experienced a runway excursion at Mumbai airport due to heavy rain. The aircraft veered off Runway 27 but managed to taxi to a parking bay after running into an unpaved area.

title: Bangladesh plane crash: F7 aircraft crashes into school; footage shows fire, smoke billowing
content: A Bangladesh Air Force F-7 BGI training aircraft crashed into Milestone School and College in Dhaka's Uttara area on Monday. The incident resulted in at least one fatality and several injuries, prompting a swift response from emergency services. Authorities have initiated an investigation to determine the cause of the crash involving the Chinese-made jet.

title: 'Let political battles be ...': SC rejects ED plea in MUDA case
content: The Supreme Court dismissed the Enforcement Directorate's plea against a Karnataka High Court order, which had quashed proceedings against B.M. Parvathi, wife of Chief Minister Siddaramaiah, in a land allotment case. The court questioned the ED's involvement, suggesting political battles should be resolved by voters.

title: Unbelievable! 'Pitches were ... ': Harbhajan Singh's big jibe at Virat Kohli
content: A recent podcast featuring Harbhajan Singh and R Ashwin has seemingly resolved any perceived tension between the two legendary Indian off-spinners. Harbhajan clarified that he never felt jealous of Ashwin's success, even after Ashwin surpassed his wicket tally.

title: China’s ‘Leave India’ order to engineers: Trade body’s SOS to government
content: India's electronics industry is sounding alarms over China's alleged informal trade restrictions, fearing a crippling blow to its global competitiveness and a $32 billion smartphone export target. The ICEA, representing major manufacturers, claims China's actions deliberately undermine India's manufacturing rise, causing delays and increased costs.

title: NEET UG 2025 counselling registration begins, check link and key dates here
content: NEET UG 2025 counselling registration starts now. Students can apply for MBBS and BDS seats. The Medical Counselling Committee manages the process on mcc.nic.in. Registration and choice-filling close on July 28, 2025. Around 1.3 lakh seats are available across India. Courses begin September 1, 2025. There are 775 participating institutes. Counselling includes three rounds and a stray vacancy round.

title: 'I am never allowed to speak', says Rahul Gandhi; BJP hits back
content: Rahul Gandhi expressed his frustration on Monday, stating that as the Leader of the Opposition, he is not being given the opportunity to speak in the Lok Sabha while government members are freely making statements. He criticized Prime Minister Modi for leaving the House quickly and emphasized the opposition's demand for a discussion on Operation Sindoor.

title: IND vs PAK row! Shahid Afridi-Ajay Devgn viral image sparks controversy
content: The India vs Pakistan match in the World Championship of Legends (WCL) 2025 was cancelled after outrage over the Pahalgam terror attack. Several ex-India players withdrew, and resurfaced photos of Ajay Devgn with Shahid Afridi intensified the backlash due to Afridi's past remarks. Organisers apologized, while the tournament continues with other matches.

title: Perplexity CEO to youngsters: Spend less time on Instagram, more time on…
content: Perplexity CEO Aravind Srinivas advises young individuals to prioritize mastering AI tools over excessive social media use, emphasizing that AI proficiency will significantly enhance employability. He acknowledges the challenges of adapting to rapidly evolving AI technology, which changes every three to six months.

title: First look of Old Trafford pitch: Is trouble brewing for Shubman Gill's men?
content: Ahead of the crucial fourth Test at Old Trafford, the pitch appears green with a damp outfield due to recent rainfall. India, trailing 1-2, aims to level the series against England, who are buoyed by their Lord's victory. Shubman Gill leads India's charge, but weather forecasts predict intermittent showers throughout the match, potentially impacting play.

title: Dragon fire extinguished! How India has successfully countered China’s fertiliser export blocks
content: India has adeptly countered China's fertilizer export restrictions, a move seen as supply chain manipulation. Facing DAP shortages during the Kharif season, India secured crucial agreements with Saudi Arabia and Morocco for substantial DAP supplies.

title: Tamil Nadu CM Stalin hospitalised after sudden health scare; here's what doctors say
content: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin was admitted to Apollo Hospitals in Chennai today after experiencing mild giddiness during his morning walk. According to an official statement released by Apollo Hospitals, Dr. Anil BG, the director of medical services, confirmed that Stalin is undergoing a comprehensive evaluation. Currently, diagnostic tests are being conducted to determine the cause of his symptoms.

title: 'Good job': OpenAI CEO praises programmer who beat company's coding tool;
content: In a surprising turn, Polish programmer Przemysław Dębiak, known as "Psyho," triumphed over OpenAI's coding tool at the AtCoder World Tour Finals 2025. OpenAI CEO Sam Altman lauded Dębiak's victory, while the company acknowledged its tool's second-place finish. Dębiak celebrated his win, expressing exhaustion and surprise at the widespread interest in programming contests.

title: 'He is still Justice': SC schools lawyer for calling Yashwant informally 'Varma'
content: The Supreme Court declined an urgent hearing for a petition seeking FIR registration against Justice Yashwant Varma concerning the cash-at-home controversy. Allegations of misconduct arose after a fire at his residence revealed a large sum of unaccounted cash. A prior inquiry led to impeachment recommendations, which Justice Varma is now challenging.

title: 2006 Mumbai train blasts: HC acquits all 12 accused; court says prosecution failed to prove case
content: In a significant ruling, the Bombay High Court overturned the death sentences of five men convicted in the 2006 Mumbai train bombings. The court acquitted all twelve accused who were previously convicted by the special trial court in September 2015. Justices Anil Kilor and Shyam Chandak of the special bench quashed and set aside the trial court's verdict.

title: F-35 stuck in Kerala: After 5 weeks, stranded UK fighter jet to leave India tomorrow
content: A British F-35B Lightning II fighter jet, grounded in Thiruvananthapuram since June 14 due to a hydraulic system fault, is scheduled to depart on Tuesday. A joint UK-US team, including Royal Navy and Lockheed Martin personnel, completed extensive repairs after an initial attempt failed.

title: Muslim man marries Hindu woman; Haryana panchayat orders separation
content: A panchayat in Haryana's Charkhi Dadri district has ordered the separation of an interfaith couple and imposed a social boycott on the Muslim man's family across three villages following tensions sparked by their marriage. The decision was made after protests erupted when villagers learned of the union between Shahid, a Muslim man, and Preeti, a Hindu woman.

title: TCS new benching policy: Employees face uncertainty, fear layoffs
content: Tata Consultancy Services employees are concerned about potential layoffs. This follows the end of the first round of a new benching policy. The policy limits the non-billable period for employees. Some employees express worries about job security on social media. A workers' rights organization has requested government intervention. They describe the policy as inhumane.

title: 'Japanese first': Voters back Trump-inspired party to ‘Make Japan Great Again’
content: Japan's ruling LDP experienced setbacks in parliamentary elections as right-wing populist groups gained traction, potentially signaling a shift in the nation's political landscape. Sanseito, a populist party, saw significant growth by appealing to younger voters with nationalist messages and anti-globalist views. Despite the losses, Prime Minister Ishiba intends to remain in office, navigating challenges like US tariff threats.

title: Jane Street Sebi ban: US trading firm barred from Indian market allowed to resume trade
content: Jane Street has been permitted by SEBI to resume trading in Indian stock markets, although exchanges are yet to facilitate their trades. While SEBI monitors closely, Jane Street has committed to refrain from options trading and cash transactions until clarifying past trades.

title: Just In: 2 big blows for Team India ahead of Manchester Test – Squad Updated!
content: Nitish Kumar Reddy is out of the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy due to a left knee injury, confirmed by the BCCI. Arshdeep Singh is also sidelined for the fourth Test against England with a thumb injury sustained during practice. Anshul Kamboj has been added to the Indian squad as cover for Singh's injury for the fourth Test at Old Trafford.

title: CHESS | FIDE WC 2025 in India; Top players to battle for spot in 2026 Candidates
content: India is set to host the 2025 FIDE World Cup, a prestigious chess tournament scheduled from October 30 to November 2. The event will feature 206 players competing in a single-elimination format. The top three finishers will secure spots in the 2026 Candidates Tournament. Players can qualify through various routes, including continental events, ratings, and nominations.

title: LS adjourned within first 20 minutes: Ruckus in Parliament on first day of Monsoon session
content: The Lok Sabha's Monsoon Session commenced turbulently, adjourning shortly after convening due to opposition uproar. MPs demanded Prime Minister Modi address Donald Trump's claims regarding Operation Sindoor, disrupting initial proceedings despite Speaker Birla's assurances of later discussion.

title: '10 years of abuse': UK ex-MP accuses husband of sexual assault
content: Former UK Conservative MP Kate Kniveton has revealed years of abuse by her ex-husband, Andrew Griffiths, also a former Tory MP. In a new documentary, Kniveton details the decade-long abuse, which continued through legal channels even after she left. She highlights the failures of family courts in protecting victims and children, emphasizing that domestic abuse affects people from all backgrounds.

title: 'Terrorists' houses razed to ground within 22 mins': PM Modi's address ahead of Monsoon session
content: Prime Minister Modi commenced the Monsoon session of Parliament with celebratory remarks, highlighting India's military strength demonstrated in Operation Sindoor, which targeted terror camps. He lauded the nation's space achievements and economic progress, noting its rise towards becoming the world's third-largest economy.

title: Fake teacher IDs, Rs 30L bribes: How Shalarth IDs became tools of graft; inside govt teacher portal scam
content: A massive fraud has been uncovered in Maharashtra's education system, involving the misuse of the Shalarth portal. Senior education officers allegedly created fake teacher IDs and hired unqualified individuals for bribes, siphoning off an estimated Rs 2,000-3,000 crore. A Special Investigation Team has been formed to probe the scam, with arrests and suspensions already underway.

title: IND vs PAK: Former Australia cricketer on cancelled WCL clash - 'I love India...'
content: Following the recent terror attack in Pahalgam, the World Championship of Legends (WCL) match between India and Pakistan has been canceled due to the reluctance of former Indian players to participate. Brett Lee expressed his hope for reconciliation between the two nations while emphasizing the tournament's inclusive nature.

title: Monsoon session: Income Tax bill, anti-doping law on agenda; full list of key bills
content: The Monsoon Session of Parliament is set to commence, featuring 15 bills for consideration, including key legislation on finance, commerce, and income tax. A new digital attendance system will be implemented for MPs, enhancing transparency. Discussions are anticipated on Operation Sindoor and international relations, alongside debates on crucial policy updates across various sectors.

title: Gold price prediction: What's the rate outlook for July 21 - should you buy or sell?
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are expected to remain steady amidst global economic uncertainties. Last week, silver outperformed, reaching multi-year highs due to strong industrial demand, while gold benefited from safe-haven flows driven by trade tensions. Market attention is focused on upcoming economic data releases and Fed Chair Powell's speech, which could influence precious metals momentum.

title: Mumbai soaked again: Heavy rains lash city early morning; Andheri subway shut
content: Mumbai faced disruptions early Wednesday due to heavy rainfall, slowing down city traffic. The Andheri subway closed due to waterlogging. The IMD forecasts partly cloudy skies with moderate rain or thunderstorms. A low-pressure system in the Bay of Bengal is expected to increase rainfall in coastal Maharashtra.

title: 'No one is above the law': Trump shares AI video showing Obama being arrested
content: Donald Trump shared an AI-generated video on Truth Social depicting Barack Obama's arrest by FBI agents in the Oval Office. The deepfake video, originating from TikTok, shows Obama being handcuffed while Trump smiles. It includes Democratic leaders saying, "No one is above the law," followed by Obama in prison, sparking strong reactions on social media.

title: Landslide hits Mata Vaishno Devi Yatra route in Katra; 10 injured
content: Heavy rainfall in Jammu and Kashmir led to a landslide on the Mata Vaishno Devi yatra route in Katra on Monday morning. The incident, occurring near Banganga at Gulshan Ka Langar, injured four pilgrims.

title: Spooky! Annabelle doll goes missing after paranormal investigator's death
content: The death of paranormal investigator Dan Rivera in Gettysburg, while on tour with the infamous Annabelle doll, has sparked unease. Although authorities confirmed Annabelle was not present in his hotel room, the timing of his death has rattled believers.

title: IND vs ENG | Manchester Test: Injuries scuttle India’s preparation
content: India faces injury concerns ahead of the fourth Test in Manchester, with Nitish Kumar Reddy potentially ruled out due to a knee injury. Arshdeep Singh and Akash Deep are also being monitored. Anshul Kamboj has been called up as cover. The team might rely on Shardul Thakur and Washington Sundar to step up, especially with uncertainty around Rishabh Pant's recovery.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 tops 25,000 mark; BSE Sensex surges 300 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened flat in trade on Monday. While Nifty50 was near 24,950, BSE Sensex was down around 50 points.

title: Who was Tommy Oswald? All you need to know about the athlete who died at 33
content: The Australian athletics community mourns the sudden demise of Tommy Oswald, a 33-year-old runner, father, and community leader. Known as 'Australia's nicest bloke,' Oswald's unexpected passing has deeply affected many. He gained recognition for his compassion, notably welcoming his pregnant cousin into his home. Oswald founded Athletes Australia, a large online community, fostering connection among athletes.

title: ‘Saiyaara’: Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda starrer records historic Rs 83 crore debut weekend
content: Mohit Suri's 'Saiyaara,' starring debutants Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda, has achieved a historic opening weekend, grossing over Rs 80 crore. Defying expectations, it surpassed Suri's previous records and secured a spot among 2025's top openers. The film's success is attributed to its fresh cast, music, and emotional storytelling, resonating strongly with younger audiences, outperforming several big banner films.

title: ‘Sign your own projects’: Staff room taunt may have pushed Sharda student to suicide
content: Jyoti Jhangra, a BDS student at Sharda University, tragically died by suicide after being accused of forging a professor's signature on her project file. The incident led to her father being called to campus, and despite assurances from the HOD, Jyoti felt targeted by faculty.

title: ‘We are globally the richest ...’: VP Dhankhar bats for unity amid language row
content: Vice President Jagdeep Dhankhar has urged national unity amidst ongoing language controversies. He emphasized India's linguistic richness, highlighting Sanskrit, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Hindi, and Marathi. Dhankhar stated languages should unite, not divide, and those using language divisively should embrace Indian culture.

title: IND vs PAK | 'There's one bad egg...': Shahid Afridi breaks silence
content: Shahid Afridi has strongly criticized Indian players for withdrawing from the World Championship of Legends match against Pakistan, emphasizing that sports should remain separate from politics. He lamented the sudden change of heart after the Indian team had already arrived and practiced.

title: Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations for July 21 - check list
content: Stock market recommendations: Motilal Oswal Financial Services recommends Vishal Mega Mart and State Bank of India as top stock picks for the week starting July 21, 2025. Vishal Mega Mart aims for expansion with strong store economics, while SBI launched a ₹25,000-crore QIP to support growth and strengthen its capital adequacy, positioning it for sustainable growth.

title: Kirk Cousins dragged into affair scandal as Netflix shades Astronomer CEO
content: Netflix waded into a scandal involving Astronomer CEO Andy Byron. The streaming service used a Kirk Cousins clip about Coldplay. This happened amid affair rumors surrounding Byron. Social media noticed the sly dig. Cousins, known for his wholesome image, got caught in the crossfire. He also faces a QB battle with Michael Penix Jr. Netflix's timing made Cousins trend again.

title: Lakers may waive $9.16 M guard to clear space for Marcus Smart trade
content: The Los Angeles Lakers are reportedly planning to waive Shake Milton to create roster space for Marcus Smart, who is expected to sign a two-year deal. This move signifies the Lakers' focus on acquiring experienced veterans and defensive-minded players. The team is navigating cap constraints to improve their roster for a deeper playoff run.

title: Shaquille O’Neal predicts Klay–Megan Thee Stallion romance won’t last long
content: Klay Thompson and Megan Thee Stallion's budding romance has captured attention, marked by public appearances and shared workouts. Despite their apparent happiness, Shaquille O'Neal predicts a short-lived relationship, estimating it will last only six weeks. However, Mike Tyson countered, suggesting the couple might have more staying power, considering their connection and compatibility.

title: IND vs PAK | Will India skip another Pakistan clash ? Team owner drops hint
content: The highly anticipated World Championship of Legends (WCL) 2025 clash between India and Pakistan has been cancelled. The decision follows the Indian team's refusal to participate, citing the Pahalgam terror attack in April. Despite India's withdrawal, the tournament will proceed as scheduled. Organizers initially aimed to foster positive memories but acknowledged unintentionally stirring emotions.

title: Big Supreme Court Order In 2023 Custodial Torture Case In J&K's Kupwara
content: In an important ruling against custodial violence this morning, the Supreme Court has ordered a CBI inquiry into the alleged torture of a police constable back in 2023 at a Joint Interrogation Centre (JIC) in Jammu and Kashmir's Kupwara.

title: Excerpt | 'Jeetu Bhai, Many Have Been Killed': A Journalist Recounts 2006 Mumbai Train Blasts
content: "'Jeetu bhai!!! A bomb has exploded in a train outside my building!  Many people have been killed. Send a camera unit fast,' Odysteven Gomes from my channel screamed on the phone...I hastily left the cinema hall and rang the cops to get more details.

title: World's Top Court Steps In, Reminding Governments To Tackle Global Warming
content: The world's top court is poised to tell governments what their legal obligations are to tackle global warming, and possibly outline consequences for polluters that cause climate harm to vulnerable countries.

title: F-35B Fighter To Fly Out Of Kerala Tomorrow After Being Grounded For 5 Weeks
content: On June 14, the F-35B fighter jet, en route from the UK to Australia, made an emergency landing in Kerala's Trivandrum after it encountered a hydraulic failure and has been stranded since.

title: Decontaminated Fukushima Soil Used At Japanese Prime Minister's Office To Prove Safety
content: Decontaminated but slightly radioactive soil from Fukushima was delivered Saturday to the Japanese prime minister's office to be reused in an effort to showcase its safety.

title: 2 Thieves Were Arrested In Delhi. Then Mumbai, Bengaluru Connection Emerged
content: In a significant breakthrough, the Delhi Police have arrested two criminals linked to more than two dozen thefts across Delhi, Mumbai, and Bengaluru. The arrests follow a probe into a major burglary reported in Old Rajinder Nagar earlier this year.

title: 5 Rajya Sabha Members Take Oath On Opening Day Of Monsoon Session
content: Five Rajya Sabha members, including three nominated members, took oath of allegiance to the Constitution on Monday, the opening day of the Monsoon Session.

title: "Crossing All Limits": Top Court Raps Probe Agency Over Summons To Lawyers
content: Enforcement Directorate (ED) officials are "crossing all limits" and guidelines are required to stop this, Chief Justice of India BR Gavai said today, pulling up the central probe agency for issuing summons to lawyers over their advice to clients.

title: "They Were Best Friends": Epstein's Ex Says Trump Was His "Wingman"
content: US President Donald Trump was Jeffrey Epstein's "bro" and "wingman", a former girlfriend of the convicted sex offender has said. Stacey Williams, an ex-model who dated the late financier in the 1990s.

title: "Being Still A Challenge": Shubhanshu Shukla Posts Video Of 'Floating' In ISS
content: Sharing the clip on his Instagram account, Shubhanshu Shukla said he tried to control his body movements but "clearly failed."

title: Junglee Rummy: The Game Maharashtra Minister Was Seen Playing In Assembly
content: Maharashtra agriculture minister Manikrao Kokate is under fire after a video allegedly showed him playing rummy during a session of the legislative assembly.

title: 125 Dead, 468 Roads, 676 Water Schemes Disrupted In Himachal Pradesh
content: While 70 people lost their lives in rain-related calamities such as landslides, flash floods, electrocution, and building collapses, 55 died in road accidents in Himachal Pradesh.

title: Woman Found Dead By Strangulation In Kerala Lodge; Boyfriend Detained: Cops
content: A 34-year-old woman was found strangled to death at a lodge here in Ernakulam district, police said on Monday.

title: No Visit By Family, No Regret: One Month Of Sonam Raghuvanshi In Jail
content: According to sources, Sonam has adapted to the environment in jail and gelled well with other women prisoners.

title: Six Judges Sworn In At Delhi High Court, Total Strength Now 40
content: The six judges--Justice V. Kameswar Rao, Justice Nitin Wasudeo Sambre, Justice Vivek Chaudhary, Justice Anil Kshetarpal, Justice Arun Kumar Monga, and Justice Om Prakash Shukla--have been transferred from various High Courts across the country.

title: Parliament Monsoon Session LIVE: Lok Sabha Adjourned Over Opposition's Demand For Discussion On Operation Sindoor
content: Parliament Monsoon Session 2025 LIVE Updates: The Congress is likely to seek a response to US President Donald Trump's claims about mediating a ceasefire between India and Pakistan in May.

title: Lok Sabha Adjourned Again Amid Massive Sloganeering By Opposition
content: The Monsoon Session of the Parliament began on a stormy note this morning, with the Opposition, spearheaded by the Congress, trying to corner the government over the ghastly Pahalgam terror attack.

title: UPSC Aspirant, 25, Dies By Suicide In Delhi's Old Rajinder Nagar Area: Cops
content: A 25-year-old UPSC aspirant, Tarun Thakur, allegedly died by suicide in his rented accommodation in Old Rajinder Nagar, Delhi. He was found hanging from the ceiling fan.

title: Lawyer Calls Cash Row Judge "Varma", Chief Justice Asks "He's Your Friend?"
content: Chief Justice of India BR Gavai pulled up a lawyer in the Supreme Court today after he referred to Allahabad High Court judge Justice Yashwant Varma, who is being investigated after a massive cash recovery from his home, as just "Varma".

title: Nimisha Priya case takes dark turn as brother of Yemeni victim accuses mediator of financial misconduct
content: Media activist Samuel Jerome has been accused of misappropriating funds collected in Nimisha Priya’s name by Abdul Fatah Mahdi, brother of Talal Abdo Mahdi

title: Solicitor General urges apex court not to make ‘general observations’ against ED after CJI Gavai observes agency ‘crossing all limits’
content: Solicitor General says such observations fuel narrative-building outside the courtroom especially in cases with political overtones

title: Kerala CM refutes Opposition Leader’s charges on Digital University Kerala, defends graphene project and audit procedures
content: Pinarayi Vijayan terms Satheesan’s claims as ‘factually incorrect’ and defends State’s handling of university’s operations

title: Gold and cash stolen from jewellery shop in Suryapet
content: The suspects gained access from the rear of the building through a washroom area that led directly into the storage section, said Suryapet SP Rajendra Prasad

title: Andhra Pradesh liquor scam: Former Deputy CM Narayana Swamy skips SIT investigation
content: The Special Investigation Team served notice to Narayana Swamy to appear before the investigation officers on July 21, as part of investigation of the case

title: Youth missing after jumping into Jurala canal to escape speeding car
content: Gadwal SP said that 25 to 30 of the total 62 gates of the project were open at the time, raising concerns that the strong current may have swept Mahesh downstream

title: If a Chief Secretary does not obey court orders, who else will: Madras High Court judge
content: Justice Battu Devanand says, incumbent Chief Secretary N. Muruganandam would not have faced contempt proceedings if his predecessor Shiv Das Meena had complied with a court order promptly

title: UK fighter jet grounded in Kerala moved out of hangar after repairs, to fly out on July 22
content: C17-Globmaster aircraft to land in Thiruvananthapuram on Tuesday to take back 14-member expert team of UK engineers who had arrived to repair the grounded aircraft

title: With surging demand, India emerges as Malaysia's largest importer of germinating oil palm seeds
content: India imported 3.03 million tonnes of palm oil from Malaysia in 2024, representing 17.9% of Malaysia's total palm oil exports and making it the top destination for Malaysian palm oil

title: Complainant seeks confiscation of suspected leopard tooth jewellery worn by Union Minister Suresh Gopi
content: In his complaint, A. A. Muhammad Hashim had stated that he had seen TV visuals of Suresh Gopi wearing the ornament at two functions, one in Thrissur and another in Kannur

title: Pawan Kalyan on ‘Hari Hara Veera Mallu’: I have not abandoned my film
content: In a rare media interaction ahead of his Telugu film ‘Hari Hara Veera Mallu: Part 1’, actor-politician Pawan Kalyan was candid about stepping in to support his producer, AM Rathnam

title: T.N. CM Stalin admitted to hospital after giddiness during morning walk
content: He has been admitted for evaluation of his symptoms, and necessary diagnostic tests are being carried out, a bulletin from Apollo Hospitals stated

title: Wait till AAIB submits its final probe report on Air India crash: Ram Mohan Naidu
content: “We want to find out what exactly happened, and that is only going to come out once the final report has been placed,” the Union Minister said

title: Kerala Education department seeks report on roof collapse at Karthikappally school in Alappuzha
content: District Collector says deputy director of education, Karthikappally tahsildar and executive engineer of Local Self-Government department asked to visit school and submit report

title: Service road on Nelamangala–Tumakuru highway to open by June 2026, road widening project to be completed by March 2027
content: The widening of the 44.04-km stretch of National Highway 48, from the Nelamangala toll gate to Tumakuru, had come to a halt due to prolonged land acquisition issues

title: Couple killed, 471 roads closed, schools shut as torrential rains ravage Himachal
content: Authorities announced on Monday morning that schools in several subdivisions in four districts of the State would remain closed due to landslides and road blockages following heavy rains.

title: Supreme Court grants protection from arrest to Shreyas Talpade in marketing scam case in Haryana
content: A bench of Justices B V Nagarathna and K V Viswanathan issued notice to Haryana police and others on a plea filed by the actor

title: Why is Enforcement Directorate being ‘used’; political battles must be fought before electorate: Supreme Court
content: “Do not percolate this virus across the country. Let political battles be fought before the electorate… Why are you being used?” CJI asks ED which appealed against High Court dismissal of CM Siddaramaiah’s wife in MUDA case

title: BMTC suspends conductor after fatal Peenya electric bus accident in Bengaluru, outsourced driver dismissed
content: Suma, a 25-year-old woman from Mandya who lived in Sunkadakatte and worked in a private firm, was standing near the stall, and died on the spot

title: Monsoon session of Bihar Assembly proceedings adjourned till July 22 after paying obituary references
content: Protests against special intensive revision (SIR) of electoral rolls in Bihar rocked the Assembly on the inaugural day of the monsoon session

title: Justice Ashutosh Kumar takes oath as Chief Justice of Gauhati High Court
content: Justice Ashutosh Kumar has previously served as a judge at the Patna High Court and the Delhi High Court

title: Justice Vipul M. Pancholi sworn in as Chief Justice of Patna High Court
content: Justice Vipul M. Pancholi was administered the oath of office by Bihar Governor Arif Mohammed Khan at the Raj Bhavan in Patna

title: Parliament Monsoon session: Five Rajya Sabha members take oath
content: The House also paid tributes to those who lost their lives in the terror attack in Pahalgam, Jammu and Kashmir in April, and in the Air India plane crash in Ahmedabad in June

title: Prioritising safety, passengers offered rescheduling: Air India Express on cancellation of Ranchi-Delhi flight
content: The cancellation of the flight on the Ranchi-Delhi route caused a chaotic situation at the airport in Ranchi and the passengers were seen arguing with the airline's staff about rescheduling

title: Six new Judges take oath of office taking strength of Delhi High Court to 40
content: The six judges are Justices V Kameswar Rao, Nitin Wasudeo Sambre, Vivek Chaudhary, Anil Kshetrapal, Arun Kumar Monga and Om Prakash Shukla

title: ‘Relentless champion of justice, equality’: Wishes pour in as Congress chief Mallikarjun Kharge turns 83
content: The Congress chief Mallikarjun Kharge turned 83 on July 21, 2025. Wishes across political parties poured in to wish him.

title: GRSE launches last of 8 anti-submarine warfare ships for Indian Navy
content: The Kolkata-based warship maker has built eight anti-submarine warfare shallow water crafts for the Indian Navy

title: Kerala private bus operators warn of indefinite strike from July 22, set to meet Transport Minister
content: Samyukta Samara Samiti to meet Transport Minister at 4 pm on Monday. Final outcome on strike to be taken after the meeting, it has been learnt

title: This monsoon session is like a ‘Vijay Utsav’, PM Modi says hailing Operation Sindoor
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi expressed confidence that during monsoon session, the MPs “in one voice and with a victorious spirit” will articulate these feelings that will strengthen India’s military capability

title: Drugs worth ₹76 crore seized in Manipur's Jiribam
content: “Acting on a tip-off, the security forces seized heroin, concealed in 616 soap cases and 50,000 banned methamphetamine tablets in the district,” a statement said

title: AIADMK’s Anwhar Raajhaa expelled from party, joins DMK
content: The strongman from Ramanathapuram, who has been critical of AIADMK general secretary Edappadi K. Palaniswami since the party revived poll ties with the BJP, said he was left with no option but to join the DMK to protect Tamil Nadu from various threats

title: Search operation to track down terrorists resumes in Jammu and Kashmir’s Kishtwar
content: Police and army launch joint operation against Hizbul Mujahideen terrorists in Khankoo forest, Kishtwar district, Jammu and Kashmir

title: Bengaluru accounts for one-third of 39,698 registered rowdies in Karnataka
content: Bengaluru accounts for 6,249 rowdies, more than three times the number in Kalaburagi, which has the second-highest count at 1,934

title: NSUI's Odisha unit president held for allegedly raping woman 4 months ago
content: “The accused has been booked under various provisions, including rape and criminal intimidation, of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita,” the police said

title: Congress MPs move adjournment notices in Parliament to discuss Pahalgam attack, Operation Sindoor
content: Opposition is seeking to corner the government over issues like the Pahalgam attack, U.S. President Donald Trump’s repeated claims of mediating a ceasefire with Pakistan following Operation Sindoor and the Special Intensive Review of electoral rolls in Bihar

title: Waterlogging in parts of Mumbai after heavy rains; traffic affected
content: After a reduced rain spell earlier this month and sunny skies for the last few days, the metropolis witnessed heavy overnight showers

title: Andhra liquor scam: Former CM Jagan one among those who received kickbacks from distillery companies, says CID remand report
content: Police named about 40 persons, including a retired IAS officer, officers of APSBCL, one MP, former MP, public representatives and others as accused in the scam

title: 7/11 Mumbai train blasts case: Bombay HC acquits all 12 accused; says prosecution ‘utterly failed’ to prove case
content: Almost two decades after the deadly attack, the Bombay High Court has ruled that the prosecution failed to prove charges and set aside death and life sentences by Special Court in 2015

title: Landslip hits Vaishno Devi track in J&K’s Reasi district; 10 injured
content: The landslip was triggered by heavy rains which lashed Katra town, the base camp for the pilgrims visiting the shrine atop Trikuta hills, they said

title: Kerala man detained for suspected strangulation of woman in Aluva lodge
content: The accused, identified as Binu, 37, a truck driver from Neriamangalam, reportedly made a video call to his friends and exhibited the body of the woman who he claimed to have murdered

title: Three militants among six held in Manipur
content: A self-styled sergeant major of the banned Prepak was arrested from his residence at Kontha Ahallup in Imphal East district on July 19, 2025.

title: Parliament Monsoon Session Day 1 LIVE updates: Lok Sabha adjourns for third time on inaugural day; Rajya Sabha discusses The Bills of Lading Bill, 2025
content: Protests erupt in both Houses demanding discussions on the Pahalgam terror attack and Operation Sindoor and the events that ensued during the time; Opposition also questions government’s foreign policy, especially U.S. President Trump’s remarks about brokering a ceasefire between India and Pakistan

title: ‘Why did he call Parliament session?’ asks Congress MP Pramod Tiwari on PM Modi’s trip to U.K. and Maldives
content: “The Prime Minister should look at his attendance as to how many days he attended the Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha. Our Prime Minister is not serious about democracy,” said the Congress MP

title: Government announces ₹1 crore cash award for Rahul Sipligunj
content: Revanth Reddy had announced a cash reward of ₹10 lakh for the young singer when he was TPCC president

title: Odisha self-immolation case: Crime branch says student's complaint not validated by enquiry team
content: Crime Branch DG Vinaytosh Mishra said its sleuths found discrepancies in the statements of witnesses in the case

title: Six more Eklavya Model Residential Schools to start in Tripura in August, total 21 sanctioned
content: An official from the tribal welfare department stated that there are currently 2700 tribal students enrolled in the six existing EMRS, and this number is expected to double with the establishment of the six new schools

title: Man stabs wife to death at Government Hospital in Karur
content: The accused, a resident of Kulithalai, intially attacked his wife at home, and as she was receiving treatment in the hospital, he visited her and stabbed her again

title: Family of five found dead in Ahmedabad
content: Three children were among the dead too as police are examining whether the deaths were the result of a deliberate act by one or both parentsnce

title: Veteran pilot Sandhu joins Air India plane crash probe as domain expert
content: Captain Sandhu, who was also a designated examiner for the Boeing 787-8 fleet at Air India, had taken delivery of the now-crashed 787-8 plane — VT-ANB — in 2013

title: Justice Manindra Mohan Shrivastava to be sworn-in as Madras High Court Chief Justice on July 21
content: Tamil Nadu Governor R.N. Ravi is scheduled to administer the oath of office to the judge at the ceremony set to commence at 4 p.m. in the Bharathiar Mandapam in the Raj Bhavan campus

title: Congress-IUML mounts pressure on Kerala government to hold Vellappally Natesan accountable for stoking religious schism
content: CPI(M) scrambles to distance itself from the remarks of SNDP Yogam leader who also heads the Left Democratic Front-backed Renaissance Protection Samiti formed in 2019 to further progressive and secular values

title: Haryana govt blames Opposition parties for making misleading assertions on crime rise
content: The State government said that under its ‘Zero Tolerance for Crime’ policy, it has taken significant and effective measures to strengthen law and order in the State

title: Maharashtra Special Public Security Bill: joint committee didn’t follow process properly, alleges Congress
content: The joint committee consisted of 25 members and was headed by Maharashtra revenue minister Chandrashekhar Bawankule

title: Nainar Nagenthran flays DMK government over poor cleanliness in cities
content: He points out that Chennai and Madurai have ranked 38 and 40 in the national-level cleanliness survey, Swachh Survekshan 2024-25

title: Sanjay Raut slams Maharashtra’s Public Safety Bill as tool to suppress dissent
content: In an editorial column Rokhthok, published on Shiv Sena (UBT)‘s mouthpiece Saamana, MP Sanjay Raut criticised the newly passed Maharashtra Special Public Security Bill, calling it a “BJP Suraksha Bill” aimed at stifling opposition and curbing democratic protest.

title: M.P. receives investment proposals over ₹11,000 crore from Spain and Dubai, says CM Yadav
content: “The total proposals received amounted to ₹11,119 crore that are expected to create more than 14,000 employment opportunities in the State”

title: Obsession for land: Odisha forest officer found to have purchased 115 plots
content: Nityananda Nayak, Divisional Forest Officer of the Kendu Leaf Division in Keonjhar, has been placed atop Vigilance Directorate’s list of corrupt officials who have amassed assets

title: CoinDCX hit by $44.2 million security breach; founders say customer funds unaffected, safe
content: CoinDCX co-founders Sumit Gupta and Neeraj Khandelwal took to the social media platform X to address the situation, confirming that the attack was the result of a sophisticated server breach, targeting an internal wallet, not the ones holding customer assets

title: India must shun lethargy to take global leadership role: Ram Madhav
content: There is confusion all around, and India must understand where the world is going, he said and stressed that becoming a ‘Vishwa Guru’ requires more than just romantic notions to play a role in the global order

title: India records 18 lakh new brain stroke cases every year, nationwide campaign launched
content: The campaign has been launched by the ISA in collaboration with the Indian Association of Physicians-Hyderabad Chapter and the Society for Emergency Medicine India.

title: Bonalu transforms Lal Darwaza into a spectacle of faith, colour
content: Women, adorned in traditional attire and jewellery, carried bonams, decorated pots filled with cooked rice, milk and jaggery on their heads an offering symbolising gratitude and a prayer for protection from misfortune and disease

title: CBI-backed Interpol Red Notices doubled since 2023 with India's diplomatic, tech push
content: Since 2023, the number of Red Notices issued on India's request spiralled with remarkable alacrity — 100 notices in 2023, 107 in 2024 and 56 in the first six months of 2025

title: Integrated bus terminal at Karikkamuri in Kochi runs into rough weather
content: Transport Minister says substantial investment will be needed to fill the largely slushy site to prevent waterlogging. He also cites uncertainty over securing adequate funds for the project and adds that prime land owned by the KSRTC will have to be handed over to Vyttila Mobility Hub Society ‘in return for land that is of far less value or usability’

title: MPs of DMK’s allies demand office space in their constituencies
content: They allege that they are being forced to rent buildings and are unable to meet the people and discharge their duties

title: Tejashwi seeks support from Opposition and ruling parties over SIR in Bihar
content: In the letter, Mr. Yadav says the ongoing SIR in Bihar has shaken the very foundation of democracy through large-scale disenfranchisement

title: FIR against fake investment firm misusing name of Premji Invest
content: There is also an android app named PREMJIEX on Google Playstore and several WhatsApp groups under the same name, which is suspected to be created by the same fraudsters

title: DMK treating Vanniyar community as mere vote bank during elections: Anbumani Ramadoss
content: He charges Chief Minister M.K. Stalin with betraying the Vanniyar community and alleges that he has been lying about State governments not having the power to conduct a caste census

title: INTUC asks Centre for invitation to tripartite meetings, blames Air India crash on privatisation
content: Congress trade union calls for the establishment of cooperatives to protect workers against exploitation by platforms and asks why no FIR registered or punitive action taken in Air India crash case

title: Upendra Kushwaha urges CM Nitish to transfer JD-(U)’s responsibility to his son Nishant
content: Mr. Kushwaha expressed apprehension that delay in transferring the responsibility can cause irreparable loss to the party asserting that perhaps such a loss which can never be compensated.

title: ‘A useful tool’: annual share of abstentions in India’s U.N. votes at all-time high
content: Abstentions provide emerging and middle powers like India the opportunity to express themselves more freely, rather than merely going along with the consensus or voting against it, says former Permanent Representative of India to the U.N. T.S. Tirumurti

title: Over 58% Dalit voters in Bihar think unemployment is biggest poll issue: survey
content: The survey was conducted and released by the National Confederation of Dalit and Adivasi Associations also found that more than 27.4% Dalit voters in Bihar have ‘no trust’ in the Election Commission

title: Congress leaders detained in Jammu as police foil street march for J&K Statehood
content: Congress accuses J&K police of “manhandling” Rajouri MLA Iftkhar Ahmed; calls for probe into police action; during Monsoon Session of Parliament, INDIA bloc plans to raise demand for immediate restoration of Statehood

title: Centre to form multi-sectoral team in Himachal to assess disaster vulnerability
content: Team to comprise experts from NDMA, IITs, CBRI, and other institutions; Shah cites rising frequency of natural calamities in the State

title: Rangers' Eovaldi scratched from start, Phillies' Bohm to IL
content: fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . the slate wraps up with the Texas Rangers entertaining the Detroit Tigers at 7:10 p.m. ET in the ESPN Sunday night affair .

title: Bihar roll revision: 11,000 'not traceables' electors could be illegal immigrants; EC wary
content: Bharti Jain is senior editor with The Times of India, New Delhi. She has been writing on security matters since 1996. Having covered the Union home ministry, security agencies, Election Commission and the ‘prime’ political beat, the Congress, for The Economic Times all these years, she moved to TOI in August 2012. Her repertoire of news stories delves into the whole gamut of issues related to terrorism and internal strife, besides probing strategic affairs in India’s neighbourhood. title: Why Drake Maye can be a top-10 QB in 2025
content: in 11 starts from Week 6 to Week 17, Drake Maye threw for 2,254 yards, 15 touchdowns and 10 interceptions . that translated to an average of 16.0 fantasy points per game in those starts, which would have ranked just outside the top 12 quarterbacks over a full season . Maye has all the makings of a top-10 fantasy quarterback .

title: Our latest intel on trade deadline rumors, Tucker's free agency and more
content: the baseball world gathered in Atlanta for the 2025 MLB draft , home run Derby and all-star game this week . our reporters were there talking to execs, coaches, agents, scouts, players and other team sources .

title: If the College Football Playoff isn't broken, why fix it?
content: college football's opposition to an expanded, let alone expansive, playoff is dead and buried . the 81-year-old retired just this week after a second stint leading west Virginia University . plans to move from 12 participants to 16 were underway before last season's inaugural 12-teamer even took place .
